member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.Length
member.summary:
The length of the structure, in bytes. Before calling the GetWindowPlacement or SetWindowPlacement functions, set this member to sizeof(WINDOWPLACEMENT).
GetWindowPlacement and SetWindowPlacement fail if this member is not set correctly.

member.name: T:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc
member.summary:
This class represents an elliptical arc on a 2D plane.
This class is adapted for use with WPF StreamGeometryContext, and needs to be created explicitly for each particular arc.
Some helpers
It can handle ellipses which are not aligned with the x and y reference axes of the plane, as well as their parts.
Another improvement is that this class can handle degenerated cases like for example very flat ellipses(semi-minor axis much smaller than semi-major axis) and drawing of very small parts of such ellipses at very high magnification scales.This imply monitoring the drawing approximation error for extremely small values.Such cases occur for example while drawing orbits of comets near the perihelion.
When the arc does not cover the complete ellipse, the lines joining the center of the ellipse to the endpoints can optionally be included or not in the outline, hence allowing to use it for pie-charts rendering. If these lines are not included, the curve is not naturally closed.

member.name: F:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Coeffs2Low
member.summary: Coefficients for error estimation while using quadratic Bezier curves for approximation, 0 ≤ b/a ≤ 0.25

member.name: F:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Coeffs2High
member.summary: Coefficients for error estimation while using quadratic Bezier curves for approximation, 0.25 ≤ b/a ≤ 1

member.name: F:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Safety2
member.summary: Safety factor to convert the "best" error approximation into a "max bound" error

member.name: F:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Coeffs3Low
member.summary: Coefficients for error estimation while using cubic Bezier curves for approximation, 0.25 ≤ b/a ≤ 1

member.name: F:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Coeffs3High
member.summary: Coefficients for error estimation while using cubic Bezier curves for approximation, 0.25 ≤ b/a ≤ 1

member.name: F:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Safety3
member.summary: Safety factor to convert the "best" error approximation into a "max bound" error

member.param: Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the test rectangle
Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the test rectangle
member.returns: true if the interior of a closed path derived from this arc entirely contains the specified rectangular area; false otherwise

member.name: M:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Contains(Avalonia.Point)
member.summary: Tests if a specified Point2D is inside the boundary of a closed path derived from this arc. The closed path is derived with respect to the IsPieSlice value.
member.returns: true if the specified point is inside a closed path derived from this arc

member.name: M:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.Contains(Avalonia.Rect)
member.summary: Tests if the interior of a closed path derived from this arc entirely contains the specified Rectangle2D. The closed path is derived with respect to the IsPieSlice value.
member.returns: True if the interior of a closed path derived from this arc entirely contains the specified Rectangle2D; false otherwise

member.name: M:Avalonia.RenderHelpers.ArcToHelper.EllipticalArc.GetBounds
member.summary: Returns an integer Rectangle that completely encloses the closed path derived from this arc. The closed path is derived with respect to the IsPieSlice value.
